name: polyscript
description: PyScript single core to rule them all

scripts.build: export ESLINT_USE_FLAT_CONFIG=false; npm run build:3rd-party && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p esm/python && node rollup/build_python.cjs && npm run rollup:xworker && npm run rollup:core && eslint esm/ && npm run ts && npm run rollup:integrations && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:docs: mv docs/coi.js ./; rm docs/*.{js,map}; cp dist/* docs/; rm -f docs/_template.js; mv coi.js docs/
scripts.test:coverage//: due latest Pyodide changes test coverage with mocks is completely broken!
scripts.test:html: npm run test && c8 report -r html
scripts.test:integration//: Don't bother with spinning servers. Trap the tests EXIT_CODE. Kill the running server, if any. Return the EXIT_CODE to eventually throw an error.
scripts.test:integration: static-handler --coi . 2>/dev/null & SH_PID=$!; EXIT_CODE=0; playwright test --fully-parallel test/ || EXIT_CODE=$?; kill $SH_PID 2>/dev/null; exit $EXIT_CODE
scripts.size: npm run size:module && npm run size:worker
scripts.size:module: echo module is $(cat dist/index.js | brotli | wc -c) bytes once compressed
scripts.size:worker: echo worker is $(cat esm/worker/xworker.js | brotli | wc -c) bytes once compressed
scripts.update:interpreters: npm run version:pyodide && npm run version:wasmoon && npm run version:webr && npm run version:micropython && npm run version:ruby-wasm-wasi && node rollup/update_versions.cjs && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.version:ruby-wasm-wasi: git ls-remote --tags --refs --sort='v:refname' https://github.com/ruby/ruby.wasm.git | grep 'tags/[[:digit:]]\.' | tail -n1 | sed 's/.*\///'>versions/ruby-wasm-wasi
